mods.abstract: NBC syndication Southern Shindig, originating from WSM. Originally broadcast 1950-05-12, part 2. Personnel include David Cobb (announcer), Milton Estes (host), Owen Bradley and his Orchestra (performers), Owen Bradley Quintet (performers), the Jordanaires including Bob Hubbard (performers), Jack Shook (performer), Annie Lou & Danny (performers), Dutch Gordon (Owen Bradley Orchestra, trombone), Cecil Bailey (performer), Dottie Dillard (performer), Harry Draper (Owen Bradley Orchestra, violin, name unconfirmed), Oscar Eiler (Owen Bradley Orchestra, cello), Wilda Tinsley (Owen Bradley Orchestra, violin, name unconfirmed), Harold Johnson (Owen Bradley Orchestra, violin). Milton Estes states that this is the last program in the series, and that a Red Foley hosted program will follow on Monday. Part 1: http://cmfdigitization.cmf.int:2011/cdm/ref/collection/musicaudio/id/535
